title: The Hellions [1961 - South Africa] (Richard Todd) western
description:
The Hellions (1961 - UK, South Africa)

Adventure / Drama / Western

starring . . . . Richard Todd, Anne Aubrey, Jamie Uys
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0054968/


Made on location in South Africa

This was South Africa's first Western genre film and also the first co-production between South Africa, the USA and Great Britain. It was compared favourably with High Noon on which it was apparently largely based. In 19th-century South Africa, a family of hellions - Luke Billings and sons Matthew, Mark, John, and Jubal - ride into the small town of De Wylt where Police Sergeant Sam Hargis is the sole representative of law and order. Although everyone wants the outlaws driven out of town, no one is willing to join Hargis in taking a stand against them.


Video: XviD, 576x432, 29.970 fps, 2011 Kbps, 01h26m04s
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, stereo, 256 kbps
Ratio: 4:3

VHSRip, English audio, no subtitles
